description:
Kinako is stuck running the family candy shop for the day. As her friends from school come to visit one after another, she attempts to keep herself entertained, sometimes at their expense.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Constitutionals Alongside the Shopkeeper as Well as Kouhai
Kouhai to Oku Shounin to Tsuredachite
後輩と 奥商人と つれたちて
